    #!/usr/bin/env node
/**
 * @description A executable to be able to compile eggc lang files
 * @author Sebastian Daniel Tamayo Guzman <alu0101131108@ull.edu.es>
 * @since 31/03/2022
 */

"use strict";

const fs = require("fs");
const { program } = require("commander");
const { parseFromFile } = require("../index.js");
const { version, description } = require('../package.json');

/**
 * A function that compiles a eggc file
 * @param {string} origin The name of the origin file
 * @param {string} destination The name of the destination file
 * @throws Will throw if there are errors in the program or if the files
 *     can't be opened
 */
const compile = (origin, destination) => {
  let output = parseFromFile(origin);
  console.log("Input file read completed");
  fs.writeFile(destination, output, (err) => {
    if (err) {
      console.log("Failed while writting to output file: " + err);
      return;
    }
    console.log("Output file write completed");
  });
};

program
  .version(version)
  .name('eggc')
  .arguments("<filename>")
  .description(description, {
    filename: 'file with the original code'
  })
  .option("-o, --out <filename>", "Path for the output file", "output.json")
  .action((filename, options) => {
    compile(filename, options.out);
  });

program.parse(process.argv);
